channel.title: CVE Feed for Detcon -- Sitewatch Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Detcon -- Sitewatch Gateway

item.title: CVE-2017-6047|2024-08-05T15:18:49.663Z -- detcon -- sitewatch%20gateway
item.description: Detcon Sitewatch Gateway, all versions without cellular, Passwords are presented in plaintext in a file that is accessible without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2017-6049|2024-08-05T15:18:49.695Z -- detcon -- sitewatch%20gateway
item.description: Detcon Sitewatch Gateway, all versions without cellular, an attacker can edit settings on the device using a specially crafted URL.
